data.name: Unfazed
data.detailed_description: Unfazed is a fascinating 3D FPS Game that allows maximum control of a competent combatant in a hostile enviromment. The gamer can fully utilize a great variety of up to 25 different weapons including rifles, semi-automatic guns, grenades, knives, revolvers and DMRs. He fights his way through zombies and giant spiders among others to emerge victorious. As the game offers unlimited levels there is both endless thrill adventure for both the experienced gamer and the first time rookie!
data.about_the_game: Unfazed is a fascinating 3D FPS Game that allows maximum control of a competent combatant in a hostile enviromment. He fights his way through zombies and giant spiders among others to emerge victorious. As the game offers unlimited levels there is both endless thrill adventure for both the experienced gamer and the first time rookie!
data.short_description: Unfazed is a fascinating 3D FPS Game that allows maximum control of a competent combatant in a hostile enviromment. The gamer can fully utilize a great variety of up to 25 different weapons including rifles, semi-automatic guns, grenades, knives, revolvers and DMRs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1/7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 (K8) 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics with OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Athlon II (K10) 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2xx Series or AMD Radeon HD 5xxx Series (Excluding Integrated Chipsets) with OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
